channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Get ready for 'True RGB' TVs – Sony's OLED-busting next-gen TVs seem to have a name, and they won't be alone
item.description: Sony's new trademark paves the way for its RGB LED TVs

item.title: Experts "deeply concerned" by India's plan to force all smartphones to run pre-installed security app
item.description: Authorities said the state-owned Sanchar Saathi app comes as a way to halt cybercrime, but digital rights experts fear for users' privacy and mission creep. Here's all we know.

item.title: The new Sony A7 V upgrades impress, but the Sony A7 IV is an excellent value in this post-Cyber Monday deal
item.description: The Sony A7 V was announced today, as the A7 IV falls to a record-low price. But which one is the better deal?

item.title: How to watch What is the Monarchy for? on BBC iPlayer (it's *FREE*)
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch What is the Monarchy for? for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: MacBook Pro M5 : le nouveau roi des laptops Apple profite d’une ristourne de 100 € sur Amazon
item.description: Un ultraportable capable de faire tourner la suite Adobe sans chauffer ni lever la voix : c’est exactement ce que promet le nouveau MacBook Pro M5. Et pour une fois, la note ne s'envole pas trop. Amazon le propose déjà sous son prix de lancement de 1 699 euros au lieu de 1 799 euros.

item.title: The most ridiculous Pixel 10 Pro XL deal is still live at Mint Mobile - get it for just $499 upfront
item.description: Mint Mobile's huge deal on the Google Pixel 10 Pro XL gets you this top-of-the-line device for just $499 without the annoying trade-in.

item.title: Amazon's new AI can code for days without human help. What does that mean for software engineers?
item.description: Amazon Web Services on Tuesday announced a new class of artificial intelligence systems called "frontier agents" that can work autonomously for hours or even days without human intervention, representing one of the most ambitious attempts yet to automate the full software development lifecycle.The announcement, made during AWS CEO Matt Garman's keynote address at the company's annual re:Invent conference, introduces three specialized AI agents designed to act as virtual team members: Kiro autonomous agent for software development, AWS Security Agent for application security, and AWS DevOps Age...

item.title: The audiophile iPod Shuffle replacement of your dreams is coming from the best budget music player maker, based on this leak
item.description: Fiio's more affordable sub-brand appears to be preparing a tiny music player

item.title: As we bow out of Cyber Monday, here's one last SSD deal to savor, this time from KingSpec
item.description: Cyber Monday might be over, but there are a few final deals that you can still cash in on, notably this KingSpec 4TB SSD.

item.title: Sony Wants to Launch a Stablecoin and So Does Everyone Else
item.description: Corporations are in a hurry to pivot to the blockchain, but they're turning up their nose at bitcoin.

item.title: EU Court gives the Dutch the green light to pursue Apple App Store anti-trust case
item.description: The European Court of Justice says the Netherlands can go after Apple over its App Store commissions.

item.title: Montée de la concurrence | Le patron d’OpenAI lance une « alerte rouge » à ses employés
item.description: Le patron d’OpenAI, Sam Altman, a lancé l’« alerte rouge » dans un message interne aux salariés, un appel à recentrer les travaux de la start-up sur son produit phare, l’assistant d’intelligence artificielle (IA) générative ChatGPT, sur fond de renforcement de la concurrence.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones Nothing et CMF à choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: La marque Nothing est parvenue à s'imposer sur un marché pourtant bien chargé et propose en 2025 plusieurs modèles de smartphones, au look audacieux et au rapport qualité/prix alléchant. Lequel est fait pour vous ?

item.title: Mistral 3 : une IA française taillée pour les smartphones, les drones et les voitures
item.description: Mistral fait entendre sa petite musique. Plutôt que d'essayer de rivaliser avec les grands acteurs américains de l'IA, la start-up française a pris un chemin de traverse en proposant une alternative aux modèles IA dominants. La nouvelle livraison Mistral 3 veut ainsi s'adapter aux appareils et fonctionner en local, que ce soit dans des smartphones, des PC, des voitures ou même des drones....

item.title: This AR Accessory Turns Your Dumb Glasses Into a Google Glass Ripoff
item.description: Finally, an easy way to go full glasshole.

item.title: US Congress to consider App Store age verification measures
item.description: While the Congress is set to discuss 19 bills focused on child safety online, the App Store Accountability Act is the one that worries Apple and Google the most. Here's what's at stake.

item.title: On a essayé la nouvelle BYD Atto 2 électrique : plus d’autonomie pour mieux se battre contre la Renault 4 E-Tech
item.description: BYD a enfin lancé le maillon manquant dans sa gamme de petit SUV électrique : avec son autonomie étendue, l'Atto 2 Comfort est la version polyvalente qu'on attendait depuis le lancement du modèle. Nous avons pu essayer cette voiture électrique rivale des Renault 4 E-Tech et Peugeot E-2008.

item.title: Yes, Elden Ring Nightreign - The Forsaken Hollows DLC will be harder than the base game, but it will still be fair to players
item.description: According to Elden Ring Nightreign director Junya Ishizaki, the game's The Forsaken Hollows expansion will be harder than the base game, but not by much.

item.title: 'What have I done?': Supergirl star Milly Alcock reveals why she had a very visceral reaction to being cast in the DCU
item.description: The lead star of 2026's Supergirl movie has opened up about landing the titular role in James Gunn's DC Universe.

item.title: Scientists Created the Blackest Fabric Ever, Then Made a Dress
item.description: The “ultrablack” fabric could soon become part of cameras, solar panels, telescopes, and more.

item.title: I get why some people are suddenly freaking out about AI agents in Windows 11 – I'm worried, too, but let's not panic just yet
item.description: Microsoft cautioning that you need to 'understand the security implications of enabling an AI agent' is unsettling.

item.title: Score the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic for as little as $249.99 with this mega trade-in deal
item.description: Buy the all-new Galaxy Watch 8 Classic from Samsung for as little as $249.99 when you trade in your current smartwatch.

item.title: Be Careful What You Wish for in the First Trailer for ‘Obsession’
item.description: It's destined to be one of next year's most talked-about horror films, opening May 15, 2026.

item.title: OpenAI’s ‘Code Red’ Crisis Memo Teases New Model and Ads in ChatGPT
item.description: Sam Altman is scared.

item.title: A leader’s role in fostering AI superpowers
item.description: Mastering the five levels Since the launch of ChatGPT three years ago, almost everyone has used Artificial Intelligence in some fashion to help with their work and the world collectively believes AI holds potential. I have written on AI subjects three times before in this series – on strategy & AI, on AI investment, and on AI’s impact on entry level hiring. The third was co-authored with friends Ahmad Zaidi, co-founder and CEO of AI start-up TransforML, and Gui Loureiro, Regional CEO Walmart Canada, Central America, Chile and Mexico and co-author of Reinventing the Leader. That team returns fo...

item.title: Apple Music Replay 2025 is back with new listening stats
item.description: Apple Music is getting ahead of Spotify Wrapped with the launch of its yearly recaps. This year’s Apple Music Replay is available natively within the app and comes packed with even more listening stats, allowing you to review all the new artists you listened to, which ones you kept returning to, and who made a […]

item.title: Voici la première station-service sans pompe à essence en France, et c’est une petite révolution
item.description: En Bretagne, l'entreprise néerlandaise Fastned va inaugurer en 2026 une station-service d'un nouveau genre : sans une goutte d'essence et uniquement réservée aux voitures électriques avec la présence de bornes de recharge.

item.title: Get your Christmas shopping done early with these cheap stocking filler gifts for gamers
item.description: Load up your Christmas stockings with these excellent deals on gifts for gamers.

item.title: 3 new Apple TV movies and shows to watch in December 2025
item.description: From the streaming debut of a blockbuster hit to the cutest nature docuseries ever, here are the three new Apple TV movies and shows releasing in December 2025.

item.title: OpenAI slammed for app suggestions that looked like ads
item.description: OpenAI said the app suggestion was only a test and not a paid ad.

item.title: Discord users can now buy in-game items without leaving the platform
item.description: Discord users can now purchase digital game items directly within the platform, create wishlists, and send gifts through DMs.

item.title: I’ve picked the best Cyber Monday TV deals still going, including some of the top TVs I’ve personally tested this year
item.description: Cyber Monday is done, but some of the best TVs I've tested still have great deals.

item.title: Android sur SteamOS et Linux : Valve sort l’artillerie lourde avec le projet Lepton
item.description: Vous connaissez Proton, l'outil magique qui fait tourner Cyberpunk 2077 sur votre Steam Deck ? Préparez-vous à accueillir Lepton. Valve adapte la technologie Waydroid pour intégrer l'écosystème Android directement dans Steam. Une grenouille en logo, des fichiers de configuration repérés : le plan de Valve se dessine.

item.title: Les voitures électriques de Huawei sont prêtes pour arriver en Europe : la preuve avec cette photo volée
item.description: Des images espion récemment apparues sur la toile lèvent le voile sur la version internationale du système d'infodivertissement du nouvel Aito M9. Au-delà d’un simple changement de langue, Huawei semble avoir profondément repensé son écosystème numérique pour répondre aux normes, aux habitudes et aux services attendus hors de Chine.

item.title: Anker’s new desktop docking station has a removable USB-C hub you can take with you
item.description: Anker has released a new docking station that eliminates the problem of having to choose between portability and a plethora of ports. The 13-in-1 Anker Nano Docking Station includes various USB and video ports so you can quickly connect a laptop to multiple monitors, but its most useful feature is a small, portable USB-C hub […]

item.title: The Switch 2 is still on sale at Walmart if you missed out during Cyber Monday
item.description: One of the biggest surprises of Cyber Monday was the excellent discount we saw on the Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World bundle, which dropped the price of Nintendo’s latest console by $50. We expected the price to return to normal once the shopping holiday ended, but — surprise, surprise — it’s still going […]

item.title: Why small businesses must go narrow (extremely narrow) to survive
item.description: The path to success runs through radical specialization. A few blocks from my home sits a small Japanese grocery store that has been in the neighborhood for years. It’s the kind of place that once felt irreplaceable—carefully sourced ingredients, shelves stocked with items I couldn’t find in mainstream supermarkets, and an owner who knows her regulars....

item.title: YouTube releases its first-ever recap of videos you’ve watched
item.description: YouTube Recap features a set of up to 12 different cards that highlight a user's top channels, interests, the evolution of their viewing habits, and which personality type they fall into based on the videos they loved to watch.

item.title: I've fallen in love with the GoChess smart chess board, and it's currently on sale
item.description: This smart chess set is helping me improve my chess game, and it's still on sale after Cyber Monday.

item.title: Cyberespionnage sur Chrome : des extensions malveillantes ont piraté 4,3 millions d’internautes à l’insu de Google
item.description: Pendant sept ans, une entité pirate intitulée ShadyPanda a transformé 145 extensions Chrome et Edge en véritables logiciels espions. Au terme de leur mutation, les extensions étaient capables de siphonner l'historique, les cookies et les recherches des internautes.

item.title: A data breach at analytics giant Mixpanel leaves a lot of open questions
item.description: We sent over a dozen questions to Mixpanel's CEO about the company's data breach. Here's what we want to know.

item.title: Ugreen Nexode 130 W : cette petite batterie à -38 %, parfaite pour les baroudeurs, vous suivra partout avec ses 20 000 mAh
item.description: La Ugreen Nexode c'est le genre de batterie externe qui fait office d'investissement, elle est pratique, mobile et permet de recharger avec une charge rapide plusieurs appareils. Sur Amazon, elle s'affiche à 49,99 euros au lieu de 79,99 euros.

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2025: How to watch and follow along live
item.description: Amazon Web Services’ big annual event, re:Invent 2025, is getting into full swing in Las Vegas this week, and you can follow the keynotes live right here.

item.title: YouTube s’inspire enfin de la meilleure idée de Spotify avec YouTube Recap : comment y accéder
item.description: YouTube propose enfin un résumé de son année sur la plateforme. Un récap demandé depuis longtemps par les fans.

item.title: Ninja kitchen appliances are going cheap post-Cyber Monday – great deals on the Creami, Crispi, and more
item.description: There are still record-breaking deals on Ninja appliances, and some prices are even better now than they were on Black Friday.

item.title: Amazon starts testing ‘ultra-fast’ 30-minute deliveries
item.description: The new "ultra-fast" delivery option will allow Amazon to better compete with services like DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Instacart.

item.title: Personne n’a réussi à copier WeChat hors de Chine : pourquoi Elon Musk pense y arriver avec X
item.description: Dans une interview récente, Elon Musk a réaffirmé son objectif final : transformer X en une copie améliorée de WeChat. Il veut recréer le succès phénoménal de l'application chinoise à l'échelle mondiale. Sauf que copier une anomalie culturelle chinoise pour l'imposer à l'Occident, c'est un défi que personne n'a relevé.

item.title: How to watch Dancing With The Holidays on Fubo (it's free)
item.description: Here's how to watch Dancing With The Holidays online, from anywhere and for free on Fubo as the DWTS Christmas special airs on ABC in the US.

item.title: Why are U.S. mass killings in 2025 the lowest since 2006?
item.description: According to a database maintained by the Associated Press and USA Today, the U.S. has seen 17 mass killings in 2025. A shooting last weekend at a children’s birthday party in California that left four dead was the 17th mass killing this year—the lowest number recorded since 2006, according to a database maintained by the Associated Press and USA Today in partnership with Northeastern University.Experts warn that the drop doesn’t necessarily mean safer days are here to stay and that it could simply represent a return to average levels.“Sir Isaac Newton never studied crime, but he says ‘What g...

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un super trio Xbox (casque, manette et 3 mois Game Pass Ultimate)
item.description: On est au deuxième jour du calendrier de l'Avent 2025 de Frandroid. Dans le cadre du concours, vous pouvez remporter un joli lot Xbox avec une manette en édition spéciale, un casque sans fil et 3 mois au Game Pass Ultimate.

item.title: Cyber Monday may be over, but the best value Garmin deal of all is still live right now
item.description: The Garmin Epix Pro (Gen 2) is actually the best value Garmin Watch you can buy, and it's still on offer for Cyber Monday.

item.title: Vous ne devinerez jamais à quoi sert ce nouvel accessoire Kobo
item.description: Kobo présente une télécommande Bluetooth sobre et ergonomique pour liseuses. Elle permet de tourner les pages sans effort, pour une lecture confortable même allongé. Elle coûte la bagatelle de 29,99 euros.

item.title: DC Comics’ Festive ‘Sweater Weather’ Covers Are a Real Winter Warmer (Exclusive)
item.description: Feeling the chill of the season? io9's got your first look at DC's steamy seasonal comics covers to get you nice and cozy.

item.title: Diseased Baby Ants Ask Their Nestmates to Poison Them With Acid to Protect the Colony, Study Finds
item.description: Ant pupae might be less selfish than most humans.

item.title: Amazon Has New Frontier AI Models—and a Way for Customers to Build Their Own
item.description: Nova Forge lets Amazon’s customers train frontier models for different tasks—a potential breakthrough in making AI actually useful for businesses.

item.title: AWS CEO Matt Garman Wants to Reassert Amazon’s Cloud Dominance in the AI Era
item.description: As Google and Microsoft continue to surge, the AWS chief lays out his pitch: cheaper, reliable AI delivered at hyperscale.

item.title: The best thing I bought this year: a Zippo-sized rechargeable flashlight
item.description: I was never a Boy Scout, but I have always embraced their “be prepared” motto. When I leave the house it’s never without my everyday carry kit that, among other things, includes wireless earbuds, a small battery, extra glasses — and a flashlight. In fact, I’ve long been on the hunt for what I consider […]

item.title: Simular’s AI agent wants to run your Mac, Windows PC for you
item.description: Simular, a startup building AI agents for Mac OS and Windows, has solved the AI hallucination problem in a compelling way.

item.title: Amazon releases an impressive new AI chip and teases an Nvidia-friendly roadmap
item.description: AWS has been building its own AI chips – and systems – for years now. It just released its third version, known as Trainium3 with some impressive specs.

item.title: AWS announces new capabilities for its AI agent builder
item.description: AWS is introducing new capabilities for its AI agent-building platform, including memory and evaluation tools.

item.title: La Google Pixel Watch 4 profite de la fin du Black Friday pour baisser de prix
item.description: Dévoilée cet été, la Google Pixel Watch 4 est une montre connectée premium précise, complète et qui a même bénéficié de quelques améliorations. Et elle affiche enfin un prix réduit : Amazon et Darty la proposent à 329 euros au lieu de 399 euros.

item.title: RAM Costs Have Already Come for the Beloved Raspberry Pi
item.description: Every single computer, including DIY boards like the Raspberry Pi, will cost more, and it's only going to get worse.

item.title: OpenAI déclare l’alerte rouge : ChatGPT menacé par la montée en puissance de Google Gemini
item.description: L'histoire a le sens de l'ironie. Il y a trois ans, Google déclenchait une alerte générale à la sortie de ChatGPT. Aujourd'hui ? C'est l'inverse. Sam Altman vient de déclarer un "Code Rouge" chez OpenAI. La cause est simple : Gemini 3 Pro est devenu trop dangereux.

item.title: Google voudrait afficher le numéro IMEI de votre smartphone sur l’écran de verrouillage, mais pourquoi ?
item.description: Les smartphones Android pourraient bientôt afficher leur numéro IMEI directement sur l'écran de verrouillage. Il y a une logique derrière ce choix étonnant.

item.title: Windows 11 : la mise à jour qui améliore le mode sombre fait finalement buguer le mode sombre
item.description: La dernière mise à jour de Windows 11 est censée améliorer significativement le mode sombre dans l'Explorateur de fichiers. Problème : elle provoque un bug d'affichage du mode sombre dans ce même Explorateur.
